title: Cheese and bacon stuffed pasta shells
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) (conchiglioni rigati (large pasta shells)', '1 tbsp olive oil', '4 rashers of smoked bacon, roughly chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '50g (2 oz) crusty white bread, whizzed in a food processor to make crumbs', '240g (9 oz) soft cheese', '4 tbsp roughly chopped fresh parsley', '1 tsp chopped fresh rosemary', '700g (1 lb 9 oz) jar of tomato passata (sieved tomatoes)', '1 (150g /5 oz) ball of buffalo mozzarella cheese, drained']
